Text:
Thanks!
Reading most of these books (or at least keeping them for reference) on my Kindle, formats other than pdf are much appreciated.
Keep them coming!
You can read epub on the kindle?

Thanks a billion for taking my request pal !
An awesome collection you have here :) would love to see more like this in the future, from everyone ! and i'll upload some too ;)
I can't load epub directly into the Kindle, but a program like Calibre converts them nicely into mobi format. Results for pdf are usually worthless

For more of the same there's another similar torrent with some new books and some also in this torrent.
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6781216/Computer_Science___Programming_eBooks_%5BePubs%5D
Great torrent, thanks uploader! All the books are formatted well, and it's a good collection of them. :)
